alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 02 at 12:49PM PDT by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Santa Clara County through 115 PM PDT... At 1248 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Morgan Hill, moving southeast at 20 mph. This storm is moving into an area of higher instability that has already had storms that have produced pea sized hail. HAZARD...Pea size hail possible, with locally erratic winds and periods of heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Santa Clara Hills; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose
